name: 70th International Astronautical Congress

picture_of_the_day.explanation: Vivid and lustrous, wafting iridescent waves of color filled this mountain and skyscape near Tanndalen

description:
The International Astronautical Congress is a yearly conference where key figures in the space industry meet and showcase/discuss events in the spaceflight industry.

The event lasts starts on 21st October and lasts a week. Some of the panels will be live streamed for free on NASA TV.
